director.name: Paul de Nooijer Paul de Nooijer

introduction: Memory lane is an almost archetypical history of a man and a woman in which dreams and illusion follow in quick succession. Memory lane is part of Point Taken. This project consists of four dance films for which Dutch choreographers and film makers joined to write a film plan. Four teams were selected to receive production funding. The four films will premiere in December 2010 at Cinedans, followed by a television broadcast by NTR. Written by KeyFilm
